div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
quinto die Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman causit the belman pas' throw the haill tone
and warne the Counsale and communite to cum to the tolbutht for the
Redschip of Sanct nicholes leide quhilkis gathtreit the aldirman
chargit ordanit and Requerit ale personis aving ony Salmonde or
money to Sanct nicholes werk to pay It thankfullie to the denys
of gilde within viij dais to the pament and redschip of Sanct nicho
les led' making Intimacioun' that thai that walde nocht pay and Rede
ale that thai aw within the said' viij dais suld' nocht be put in the generale
assedacioun' and vthiris sulde be put in the takis diuisit for thame

The saide day Robert nicholsone in Trutht offerit him Reddy to vnderly
the law in ale thingis that thome beg had to say to him quhilk
thomas comperit mocht to follow the said Robert quharfor he protestit
to be quyt of the said thomas Chalang vnto the tyme he be
new summond

The said day the ballies assignit friday that nixt cumis to Johnn'
Wilyengsone to ansuer to the borgh' stekit one him be Waltar
strachin for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra him of ane franche
for the frauche of iij barrellis of Ter and decernit the Copy
of the said borgh' to the said Johne one his expens'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xijo
die Augusti anno quo Supra

Eodem die Alexander Rede in bogferlow amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore
Willelmi blinsele prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Rede Cuj emen
dabit ut Jura volunt Et Idem Johannes conuictus de perturbio dicti
alexandri

Eodem die Johannes rettre legittimus citatus ad respondendum plegio super Ipsum
porrecto per georgium byssat pro iniusta detencione ab eo vnius barrelle
salmonum non comparuit Igitur balliui dederunt in mandatis Andree
nachtj seriando ad capiendum disctrictum ab eo et eundem Iterum ad plegium
ad dimittj si petatur Et ipsum hodie ad quindendam xxv die
dicti mensis Instantis premunire tanquam secundo die processus

Eodem die Walterus philp amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Willelmi
blinsele prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis arthour' Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt Et Idem Johannes amerciatur per dictam assisam pro proturbio
dicti Walterj cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die patricius leslie deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue
ostendem quod J Walterus philp erit Indempnes pro Johanne arthour'
aliter quam per viam Juris Et Dauid Adamsone deuenit plegius legalis
per manum suam quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro prefato Waltero
aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad
conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione per
manus suas

The saide day thome menyes was quyt of the Resat of ane barell
of Salmond fra Wat Dougles In the name of Alexander Rede be ane
assis' Johne Cullane forspekar

Eodem die Dauid teman et sponsa sua legittime vocati ad respondendum plegio
super ipsos aliis per Johannem Cullane porrecto super iniusta detencione vnius
tussie argentee xiij vncias continentes non comparuerunt Igitur precipitur Andree
nachtj seriando ad Capiendum districtum a dictis Dauid et Sponsa sua et
eundem Iterum ad plegium dimitti si petatur Ac ipsos hodie ad
quindenam xxvj diem dicti mensis Instantis premunire tanquam secundo die
huius processus

Eodem scottis cristy amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis Duncanson prelocutoris
assise pro perturbio annabelle Symsone burgi et fractionis domus
le Corbeyholl quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die elena famula Andree low amerciatur pro perturbio vxorum Willelmi
mar' et Idem eadem amerciatur pro Perturbio dicte Elena que emendabunt
ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
Augisti anno quo Supra

the said' day thome Watsone tuk to preiwe one monunday
that nixt cumis befor the balyes one monunday that nixt cumis that
William goldsmitht borrovit fra him ane pok of canuas' to pak
his gudis in

The saide day It was ordanit be the assis' that Johne Duncanson'
sal pay demi li' wax to the haly blud' lycht for the offence don'
to ane seruand' woman of Johne Waus Ande gif ony of the
saide partiis offendis tile vthiris and beis conuikit tharof sal pay x s'
to Sanct nicholes werk

The said' day Johne Steuinson' grantit to pay or ger' pay viij s'
to Johne Sancler' for cristy Symmer'

The saide day Comperit Johne Wyntone and oppinly Reuokit and
Renuncit ale condicioun' and contrakis maid' betuix him and patry chernsid'
and his wif Anent the bying and Sellinge of ane land' pertening
to him liand' in the gallovgat becausit he was nocht avisit with his
frendis and for vthir caus' to be schevin tyme and place quhar' it
efferis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvjo die Augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid theman et Sponsa sua legittime premuniti vocati
ad respondendum plegio super ipsos aliis per Johannem Cullan porrecto pro iniusta
detencione ab eo vnius tassie argentee xiiij vncias continentes non comparuerunt
Igitur precipitur Andree nachtj seriando ad capiendum districtum ab eisdem et Ipsos eundem
ad plegium dimmitti si petatur Ac eosdem hodie ad quindenam ixm diem
Septembris proximum futurum premunire ad respondendum dicto plegio tanquam tercio die huius
processus

Eodem die patricius Walcar' amerciatur per assisam ex ore Ricardi Waus prelocutorem
eiusdem pro perturbio mariorie coupar Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt
Et si dictam marioriam aut quemcumque alium perturbauit et Inde conuictus
fuerit soluet x s' fabrice ecclesie

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
penultimo die Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day Androw Cullane grantit that he hede resauit
fra Alexander rede Nyne barrellis of Salmond tharof sex
barrellis quhilkis he was avande for him Selff to Sanct
nicholes werk contenit in Ane act of this court buk mad'
Obefor and tua barrellis for henry rede his brothir contenit in
the said' act / and ane barrele that he lent obefor to Johne
Cay of Sanct nicholes werk quhilkis ix barrellis of Salmond
the saide Androw deliuerit for Sanct nicholes led' and acht Sex merkis
of Siluer of his witsonday male last bigan of his demi nethis fischingis
of Done et cetera

The said day the baillies assignit friday that nixt cumis the secund
day of September to georg smitht cordonar to ansuer peremptourly
to the borgh' strekit one him be thomas meldrum for the wrangwis'
withhaldin fra him of x s' of siluer

The said day the ballies assignit friday cum xv dais to Johnne of
mydiltoune to ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be Johnne of meldrum
for the wrangwis' takin and withhaldin fra him of thre Elne of claitht
price of the elne x s' And decernit the copy of the said borgh' to the said
Johnne of mydiltoun' apone his expens'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Secundo die mensis
Augustij anno quosupra

The said day the Alderman oppinly grantit and schew that thai had licencit
and ordanit thome beg to Reman withtin towne quhile sounday that nixt
cummis quhile he micht haue led his Elding and passit furtht of the towne
at thar command and Now throue caus' that he is hurt and may nocht travell
thai haue licenc him to Reman within the towne vnto the tyme he be
haill and new warnit be thame

The said day Johnne mydiltone lauchfully callit and nocht Comperit to follow
Johnne of meldrum in the name of his wif for the Strublance done to the
said Johnne mydiltone quharfor' the said Johnne of meldrum protestit
to be quyt of the said Johnis Chalang vnto the tyme he be new warnit

The said day Johne of mydiltone was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' Alexander chavmer forspekar for strubulance of Johne of mar'
the balye / in worde for the quhilkis he was in Ane
amerciament of the court and to Amend' as law will and forber' in tyme
to Cum Ande the saide Johne mar' was quyt of ale strubulance
of the saide Jhone of mydiltone Ande the Amendis was
continevit to monunday that nixt Cumis and referrit to the aldirman
and counsale

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die mensis
Septembris Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Secundo

The said day Dauid Ruthirfurde was in amerciament of the court be his
avine toung grant for the Strublance of the towne in the cumin apone thome
beg and hurting of him and tile amend' as law will and forber In tyme tocum

The said day Comperit thome beg and lamentablie complenit to the aldirman and ballies
that Dauid Ruthirfurd had Inuadit him and crualy / hurt within his avne lande
Ande the said Dauid being accusit be the ballies denyit the said strublance be
him self and ser Johnne Ruthirfurd his forspekar And in continent the said actioun'
was put to the decisioun of ane assis' of thir personis that Is to say Alexander
Red Johnne of Cullane Johnne of Knollis gilbert menyeis Androw murray William blinsele
Thomas Waus Alexander gray mathou branche Johnne Duncansone
Williame nicholsone Duncan collisone Androw Cullan patrik Red Alexander
King malcome crag and Johnne' arthour quhilkis Riplie awisit the greit
aitht suorne admittit and chosin be baitht the said partiies the Richtis Resonis and
allegaciounis of baitht the partijs herd sene considerrit and vnderstandin witnes
and prewis producit and bed deliuerit and furthgaf ale in ane voice concordand
that thai culd' nocht acquit the said Dauid Ruthirfurd of the strublance of the
said thome beg within his avin yard ffor the quhilkis he was in amerciament
of the court and tile amend as law will and forbeir in tyme tocum And
the said thome beg was quyt of ale strublance of the said Dauid be the
said assis' And that was gevin for dome be the moutht of Alexander
Joffrasone dempstar of the said court

The said day William chamer come Souerte to the baillies to entir georg
smitht to the baillies als' sone as he may comprehend him within the town'

The said day It was sufficientlie previt be certane famous' witnes that
Rob cordoner come Souerte be his hand vphaldin to the bailye Dauid mar
for the lawte and Remaning of Androw murray his seruand for the quhilkis It was
fundin be ane ward of the court that the said Robert aucht to find the said
bailyhe ane seruand or ellis to Entir him the said Androw agane The quhilkis
the baillies chargit him to fulfyle or he passit furtht of the tolbutht

head.add: the acquittance deliuerit be ser Johne Ruthirfurd'

div.p:
The said day schir Johnne Ruthirfurde deliuerit to the Aldirman
and Counsaile certane acquitance of the daitis eftir follouing In the first ane
acquitance of the duches of Montrois' of the Some of xl li' de data
xix Augustj anno Domini millesimo et quingentesimola Item ane acquittance
of alexander lord Erskinis of jC li' de data quarto mensis Junij Anno
Domini millesimo quingentesimo primo Item ane vthir acquitance of
Alexander lord Erskinis of jC li' de data vicesimo Junij anno Domini
millesimo et quingentesimo Item ane testimoniale of master Duncan
scheraris of the pament of my lord of abirdenis secund on tua yeris
bigane videlicet de anno Domini millesimo nonagesimo nono quingentesimo et quingentesimo
primo Item ane acquitance of the xx s' of the collectouris of the
chapellanis of abirdour de data xvijo Julij Anno Domini millesimo
et quingentesimo Item ane acquitanceof the dene of cathnes
of the Some of iij li' vj s' viij d' de data vicesimo octobris anno
Domini millesimo et quingentesimo Item ane vthir acquitance
of the dene of cathnes of iij li' vj s' viij d' de data penultimo
Julij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Secundo Item ane
acquitance of the collectouris of the chapellanis of Abirdene
of the Some of v li' and of xx s' de data quinto augustj Anno
quingentesimo primo Item ane acquitance of Johnne of
Stiruelingis comprollar of the Some of viij li' xiij d' iiii d' de
data vicesimo octauo Julij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo primo
Item ane acquitance of frer Androw sangster priour of the blakfreris
of x markis de data decimo sexto aprilis anno Domini millesimo
quingentesimo primo Item ane acquitance of the lard of
Drumis of v li' de data vicesimo Julij Anno Domini millesimo
quingentesimo Item ane vthir acquitance of the lard of Drummis
of v li' de data Secundo Augutj anno millesimo quingentesimo primo
Item ane acquittance of the blak freris of ale termes bigane
to this day

The said day androu Cullane grantit him tile haue Ressauit
fra Alexander Rede four pundis for his witsonday maile
last bigane for his hald nethis fisching of the Done

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo quinto
die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die gilbertus Monrow conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam pro perturbio
Johannis nicholsone Et Idem Johannes amerciatur per dictam assisam pro
perturbio prefati gilbertj cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes nicholsone conuictus fuit per dictam assisam pro
perturbio Willelmum Inuour

Eodem die gilbertus monrow amerciatur pro perturbio Andree logy Et
Idem andreas pro perturbio dictj gilbertj cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes nicholsone deuenit plegius gilbertum Wellis
plegius legalis quod gilbertus monrow erit Indempnes pro dicto Johanne
aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo
die mensis Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid theman et Sponsa sua legittime premuniti vocati
ad ostendem plegio super ipsos aliis per Johannem Cullane porrecto pro iniusta
detencione ab eo vnius tassie Argentee xiiijor vncias continentes non
comparuerunt Igitur precipitur Andree nachtj seriando ad capiendum districtum ab eisdem
et eundem ad plegium dimitti si petatur Ipsos hodie ad quindenam
xxiij die dicti mensis Septembris Instantis premunire tanquam quarto die
huius processus

The said' day the aldirman balyeis Counsale and communite of Abirdene
present for the tyme opinlie warnit be the hand' bell throw
the haill tone representand' the bodie of the sammyn for the tyme
Circualie Inquerit be the Officiaris and balyes gravntit and Assignit
to mastir Walter leslie parsone of menniver' full pouer' Irreuocabil'
and licence perpertuale to big and fovnd ane altar of Sanctis mongow
and tovne in the triangill of thar' est end' of thar' queir' for his
fundacioun' to be maid' at the Samyn In honour of the blissit trinite
his blissit virgin modir mary Sanctis Nicholace and Specialie of
the said Sanctis et cetera And gravntit and ordanit to gif him Ane
Autentyve evident vndir thar common' Sele tharupon

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day the borghe' fundin vpon' Dauid theman and his wif
be Johne of Cullane for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane
Siluer pece as ferd' day of process with consent and assent of batht
the said' partiis is continevit to monunday that nixt Cumis
In siklik strintht foece and effect as it standis in now but preiu
dice of ony party

The saide day Johne bane grantit him avand to Johne Wormet
demi dakir of hidis and aucht Schillingis stane of woll to
be pait within xv dais gude and Sufficient merchande gude
